38 
39 void Vocabulary::createScoringObject()
40 {
41  delete m_scoring_object;
42  m_scoring_object = NULL;
43 
44  switch(m_scoring)
45  {
46  case L1_NORM:
47  m_scoring_object = new L1Scoring;
48  break;
49 
50  case L2_NORM:
51  m_scoring_object = new L2Scoring;
52  break;
53 
54  case CHI_SQUARE:
55  m_scoring_object = new ChiSquareScoring;
56  break;
57 
58  case KL:
59  m_scoring_object = new KLScoring;
60  break;
61 
62  case BHATTACHARYYA:
63  m_scoring_object = new BhattacharyyaScoring;
64  break;
65 
66  case DOT_PRODUCT:
67  m_scoring_object = new DotProductScoring;
68  break;
69 
70  }
71 }

111 Vocabulary&

116  this->m_L = voc.m_L;

118  this->m_weighting = voc.m_weighting;
119

121 
122  this->m_nodes.clear();
123  this->m_words.clear();
124

133 void Vocabulary::create(
134  const std::vector< cv::Mat > &training_features)
135 {
136  std::vector<std::vector<cv::Mat> > vtf(training_features.size());
137  for(size_t i=0;i<training_features.size();i++){
138  vtf[i].resize(training_features[i].rows);
139  for(int r=0;r<training_features[i].rows;r++)
140  vtf[i][r]=training_features[i].rowRange(r,r+1);
141  }
142  create(vtf);
143 
144 }
145 
146 void Vocabulary::create(
147  const std::vector<std::vector<cv::Mat> > &training_features)
148 {
149  m_nodes.clear();
150  m_words.clear();
151 
152  // expected_nodes = Sum_{i=0..L} ( k^i )
153  int expected_nodes =
154  (int)((pow((double)m_k, (double)m_L + 1) - 1)/(m_k - 1));
155 
156  m_nodes.reserve(expected_nodes); // avoid allocations when creating the tree
157 
158 
159  std::vector<cv::Mat> features;
160  getFeatures(training_features, features);
161 
162 
163  // create root
164  m_nodes.push_back(Node(0)); // root
165 
166  // create the tree
167  HKmeansStep(0, features, 1);
168 
169  // create the words
170  createWords();
171 
172  // and set the weight of each node of the tree
173  setNodeWeights(training_features);
174 
175 }

186 
187  create(training_features);

209 void Vocabulary::getFeatures(
210  const std::vector<std::vector<cv::Mat> > &training_features,
211  std::vector<cv::Mat> &features) const
212 {
213  features.resize(0);
214  for(size_t i=0;i<training_features.size();i++)
215  for(size_t j=0;j<training_features[i].size();j++)
216  features.push_back(training_features[i][j]);
217 }
218 
219 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
220 
221 
222 void Vocabulary::HKmeansStep(NodeId parent_id,
223  const std::vector<cv::Mat> &descriptors, int current_level)
224 {
225 
226  if(descriptors.empty()) return;
227 
228  // features associated to each cluster
229  std::vector<cv::Mat> clusters;
230  std::vector<std::vector<unsigned int> > groups; // groups[i] = [j1, j2, ...]
231  // j1, j2, ... indices of descriptors associated to cluster i
232 
233  clusters.reserve(m_k);
234  groups.reserve(m_k);
235 
236 
237  if((int)descriptors.size() <= m_k)
238  {
239  // trivial case: one cluster per feature
240  groups.resize(descriptors.size());
241 
242  for(unsigned int i = 0; i < descriptors.size(); i++)
243  {
244  groups[i].push_back(i);
245  clusters.push_back(descriptors[i]);
246  }
247  }
248  else
249  {
250  // select clusters and groups with kmeans
251 
252  bool first_time = true;
253  bool goon = true;
254 
255  // to check if clusters move after iterations
256  std::vector<int> last_association, current_association;
257 
258  while(goon)
259  {
260  // 1. Calculate clusters
261 
262  if(first_time)
263  {
264  // random sample
265  initiateClusters(descriptors, clusters);
266  }
267  else
268  {
269  // calculate cluster centres
270 
271  for(unsigned int c = 0; c < clusters.size(); ++c)
272  {
273  std::vector<cv::Mat> cluster_descriptors;
274  cluster_descriptors.reserve(groups[c].size());
275  std::vector<unsigned int>::const_iterator vit;
276  for(vit = groups[c].begin(); vit != groups[c].end(); ++vit)
277  {
278  cluster_descriptors.push_back(descriptors[*vit]);
279  }
280 
281  DescManip::meanValue(cluster_descriptors, clusters[c]);
282  }
283 
284  } // if(!first_time)
285 
286  // 2. Associate features with clusters
287 
288  // calculate distances to cluster centers
289  groups.clear();
290  groups.resize(clusters.size(), std::vector<unsigned int>());
291  current_association.resize(descriptors.size());
292 
293  //assoc.clear();
294 
295  //unsigned int d = 0;
296  for(auto fit = descriptors.begin(); fit != descriptors.end(); ++fit)//, ++d)
297  {
298  double best_dist = DescManip::distance((*fit), clusters[0]);
299  unsigned int icluster = 0;
300 
301  for(unsigned int c = 1; c < clusters.size(); ++c)
302  {
303  double dist = DescManip::distance((*fit), clusters[c]);
304  if(dist < best_dist)
305  {
306  best_dist = dist;
307  icluster = c;
308  }
309  }
310 
311  //assoc.ref<unsigned char>(icluster, d) = 1;
312 
313  groups[icluster].push_back(fit - descriptors.begin());
314  current_association[ fit - descriptors.begin() ] = icluster;
315  }
316 
317  // kmeans++ ensures all the clusters has any feature associated with them
318 
319  // 3. check convergence
320  if(first_time)
321  {
322  first_time = false;
323  }
324  else
325  {
326  //goon = !eqUChar(last_assoc, assoc);
327 
328  goon = false;
329  for(unsigned int i = 0; i < current_association.size(); i++)
330  {
331  if(current_association[i] != last_association[i]){
332  goon = true;
333  break;
334  }
335  }
336  }
337 
338  if(goon)
339  {
340  // copy last feature-cluster association
341  last_association = current_association;
342  //last_assoc = assoc.clone();
343  }
344 
345  } // while(goon)
346 
347  } // if must run kmeans
348 
349  // create nodes
350  for(unsigned int i = 0; i < clusters.size(); ++i)
351  {
352  NodeId id = m_nodes.size();
353  m_nodes.push_back(Node(id));
354  m_nodes.back().descriptor = clusters[i];
355  m_nodes.back().parent = parent_id;
356  m_nodes[parent_id].children.push_back(id);
357  }
358 
359  // go on with the next level
360  if(current_level < m_L)
361  {
362  // iterate again with the resulting clusters
363  const std::vector<NodeId> &children_ids = m_nodes[parent_id].children;
364  for(unsigned int i = 0; i < clusters.size(); ++i)
365  {
366  NodeId id = children_ids[i];
367 
368  std::vector<cv::Mat> child_features;
369  child_features.reserve(groups[i].size());
370 
371  std::vector<unsigned int>::const_iterator vit;
372  for(vit = groups[i].begin(); vit != groups[i].end(); ++vit)
373  {
374  child_features.push_back(descriptors[*vit]);
375  }
376 
377  if(child_features.size() > 1)
378  {
379  HKmeansStep(id, child_features, current_level + 1);
380  }
381  }
382  }
383 }
384 
385 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
386 
387 
388 void Vocabulary::initiateClusters
389  (const std::vector<cv::Mat> &descriptors,
390  std::vector<cv::Mat> &clusters) const
391 {
392  initiateClustersKMpp(descriptors, clusters);
393 }
394 
395 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
396 
397 
398 void Vocabulary::initiateClustersKMpp(
399  const std::vector<cv::Mat> &pfeatures,
400  std::vector<cv::Mat> &clusters) const
401 {
402  // Implements kmeans++ seeding algorithm
403  // Algorithm:
404  // 1. Choose one center uniformly at random from among the data points.
405  // 2. For each data point x, compute D(x), the distance between x and the nearest
406  // center that has already been chosen.
407  // 3. Add one new data point as a center. Each point x is chosen with probability
408  // proportional to D(x)^2.
409  // 4. Repeat Steps 2 and 3 until k centers have been chosen.
410  // 5. Now that the initial centers have been chosen, proceed using standard k-means
411  // clustering.
412 
413 
414 // DUtils::Random::SeedRandOnce();
415 
416  clusters.resize(0);
417  clusters.reserve(m_k);
418  std::vector<double> min_dists(pfeatures.size(), std::numeric_limits<double>::max());
419 
420  // 1.
421 
422  int ifeature = rand()% pfeatures.size();//DUtils::Random::RandomInt(0, pfeatures.size()-1);
423 
424  // create first cluster
425  clusters.push_back(pfeatures[ifeature]);
426 
427  // compute the initial distances
428  std::vector<double>::iterator dit;
429  dit = min_dists.begin();
430  for(auto fit = pfeatures.begin(); fit != pfeatures.end(); ++fit, ++dit)
431  {
432  *dit = DescManip::distance((*fit), clusters.back());
433  }
434 
435  while((int)clusters.size() < m_k)
436  {
437  // 2.
438  dit = min_dists.begin();
439  for(auto fit = pfeatures.begin(); fit != pfeatures.end(); ++fit, ++dit)
440  {
441  if(*dit > 0)
442  {
443  double dist = DescManip::distance((*fit), clusters.back());
444  if(dist < *dit) *dit = dist;
445  }
446  }
447 
448  // 3.
449  double dist_sum = std::accumulate(min_dists.begin(), min_dists.end(), 0.0);
450 
451  if(dist_sum > 0)
452  {
453  double cut_d;
454  do
455  {
456 
457  cut_d = (double(rand())/ double(RAND_MAX))* dist_sum;
458  } while(cut_d == 0.0);
459 
460  double d_up_now = 0;
461  for(dit = min_dists.begin(); dit != min_dists.end(); ++dit)
462  {
463  d_up_now += *dit;
464  if(d_up_now >= cut_d) break;
465  }
466 
467  if(dit == min_dists.end())
468  ifeature = pfeatures.size()-1;
469  else
470  ifeature = dit - min_dists.begin();
471 
472 
473  clusters.push_back(pfeatures[ifeature]);
474  } // if dist_sum > 0
475  else
476  break;
477 
478  } // while(used_clusters < m_k)
479 
480 }
481 
482 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
483 
484 
485 void Vocabulary::createWords()
486 {
487  m_words.resize(0);
488 
489  if(!m_nodes.empty())
490  {
491  m_words.reserve( (int)pow((double)m_k, (double)m_L) );
492 
493 
494  auto nit = m_nodes.begin(); // ignore root
495  for(++nit; nit != m_nodes.end(); ++nit)
496  {
497  if(nit->isLeaf())
498  {
499  nit->word_id = m_words.size();
500  m_words.push_back( &(*nit) );
501  }
502  }
503  }
504 }
505 
506 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
507 
508 
509 void Vocabulary::setNodeWeights
510  (const std::vector<std::vector<cv::Mat> > &training_features)
511 {
512  const unsigned int NWords = m_words.size();
513  const unsigned int NDocs = training_features.size();
514 
515  if(m_weighting == TF || m_weighting == BINARY)
516  {
517  // idf part must be 1 always
518  for(unsigned int i = 0; i < NWords; i++)
519  m_words[i]->weight = 1;
520  }
521  else if(m_weighting == IDF || m_weighting == TF_IDF)
522  {
523  // IDF and TF-IDF: we calculte the idf path now
524 
525  // Note: this actually calculates the idf part of the tf-idf score.
526  // The complete tf-idf score is calculated in ::transform
527 
528  std::vector<unsigned int> Ni(NWords, 0);
529  std::vector<bool> counted(NWords, false);
530 
531 
532  for(auto mit = training_features.begin(); mit != training_features.end(); ++mit)
533  {
534  fill(counted.begin(), counted.end(), false);
535 
536  for(auto fit = mit->begin(); fit < mit->end(); ++fit)
537  {
538  WordId word_id;
539  transform(*fit, word_id);
540 
541  if(!counted[word_id])
542  {
543  Ni[word_id]++;
544  counted[word_id] = true;
545  }
546  }
547  }
548 
549  // set ln(N/Ni)
550  for(unsigned int i = 0; i < NWords; i++)
551  {
552  if(Ni[i] > 0)
553  {
554  m_words[i]->weight = log((double)NDocs / (double)Ni[i]);
555  }// else // This cannot occur if using kmeans++
556  }
557 
558  }
559 
560 }

570 
571 
572 float Vocabulary::getEffectiveLevels() const
573 {
574  long sum = 0;
575  for(auto wit = m_words.begin(); wit != m_words.end(); ++wit)
576  {
577  const Node *p = *wit;
578 
579  for(; p->id != 0; sum++) p = &m_nodes[p->parent];
580  }
581 
582  return (float)((double)sum / (double)m_words.size());
583 }

604 WordId Vocabulary::transform
605  (const cv::Mat& feature) const
606 {
607  if(empty())
608  {
609  return 0;
610  }

612  WordId wid;
613  transform(feature, wid);
614  return wid;

618 
619 void Vocabulary::transform(
620  const cv::Mat& features, BowVector &v) const
621 {
622  // std::vector<cv::Mat> vf(features.rows);
623  // for(int r=0;r<features.rows;r++) vf[r]=features.rowRange(r,r+1);
624  // transform(vf,v);
625 
626 
627 
628  v.clear();
629 
630  if(empty())
631  {
632  return;
633  }
634 
635  // normalize
636  LNorm norm;
637  bool must = m_scoring_object->mustNormalize(norm);
638 
639 
640  if(m_weighting == TF || m_weighting == TF_IDF)
641  {
642  for(int r=0;r<features.rows;r++)
643  {
644  WordId id;
645  WordValue w;
646  // w is the idf value if TF_IDF, 1 if TF
647  transform(features.row(r), id, w);
648  // not stopped
649  if(w > 0) v.addWeight(id, w);
650  }
651 
652  if(!v.empty() && !must)
653  {
654  // unnecessary when normalizing
655  const double nd = v.size();
656  for(BowVector::iterator vit = v.begin(); vit != v.end(); vit++)
657  vit->second /= nd;
658  }
659 
660  }
661  else // IDF || BINARY
662  {
663  for(int r=0;r<features.rows;r++)
664  {
665  WordId id;
666  WordValue w;
667  // w is idf if IDF, or 1 if BINARY
668 
669  transform(features.row(r), id, w);
670 
671  // not stopped
672  if(w > 0) v.addIfNotExist(id, w);
673 
674  } // if add_features
675  } // if m_weighting == ...
676 
677  if(must) v.normalize(norm);
678 
679 }
680 
681 
682 
683 void Vocabulary::transform(
684  const std::vector<cv::Mat>& features, BowVector &v) const
685 {
686  v.clear();
687 
688  if(empty())
689  {
690  return;
691  }
692 
693  // normalize
694  LNorm norm;
695  bool must = m_scoring_object->mustNormalize(norm);
696 
697 
698  if(m_weighting == TF || m_weighting == TF_IDF)
699  {
700  for(auto fit = features.begin(); fit < features.end(); ++fit)
701  {
702  WordId id;
703  WordValue w;
704  // w is the idf value if TF_IDF, 1 if TF
705 
706  transform(*fit, id, w);
707 
708  // not stopped
709  if(w > 0) v.addWeight(id, w);
710  }
711 
712  if(!v.empty() && !must)
713  {
714  // unnecessary when normalizing
715  const double nd = v.size();
716  for(BowVector::iterator vit = v.begin(); vit != v.end(); vit++)
717  vit->second /= nd;
718  }
719 
720  }
721  else // IDF || BINARY
722  {
723  for(auto fit = features.begin(); fit < features.end(); ++fit)
724  {
725  WordId id;
726  WordValue w;
727  // w is idf if IDF, or 1 if BINARY
728 
729  transform(*fit, id, w);
730 
731  // not stopped
732  if(w > 0) v.addIfNotExist(id, w);
733 
734  } // if add_features
735  } // if m_weighting == ...
736 
737  if(must) v.normalize(norm);
738 }

740 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
741 
742 
743 void Vocabulary::transform(
744  const std::vector<cv::Mat>& features,
745  BowVector &v, FeatureVector &fv, int levelsup) const
746 {
747  v.clear();
748  fv.clear();
749 
750  if(empty()) // safe for subclasses
751  {
752  return;
753  }
754 
755  // normalize
756  LNorm norm;
757  bool must = m_scoring_object->mustNormalize(norm);
758 
759 
760  if(m_weighting == TF || m_weighting == TF_IDF)
761  {
762  unsigned int i_feature = 0;
763  for(auto fit = features.begin(); fit < features.end(); ++fit, ++i_feature)
764  {
765  WordId id;
766  NodeId nid;
767  WordValue w;
768  // w is the idf value if TF_IDF, 1 if TF
769 
770  transform(*fit, id, w, &nid, levelsup);
771 
772  if(w > 0) // not stopped
773  {
774  v.addWeight(id, w);
775  fv.addFeature(nid, i_feature);
776  }
777  }
778 
779  if(!v.empty() && !must)
780  {
781  // unnecessary when normalizing
782  const double nd = v.size();
783  for(BowVector::iterator vit = v.begin(); vit != v.end(); vit++)
784  vit->second /= nd;
785  }
786 
787  }
788  else // IDF || BINARY
789  {
790  unsigned int i_feature = 0;
791  for(auto fit = features.begin(); fit < features.end(); ++fit, ++i_feature)
792  {
793  WordId id;
794  NodeId nid;
795  WordValue w;
796  // w is idf if IDF, or 1 if BINARY
797 
798  transform(*fit, id, w, &nid, levelsup);
799 
800  if(w > 0) // not stopped
801  {
802  v.addIfNotExist(id, w);
803  fv.addFeature(nid, i_feature);
804  }
805  }
806  } // if m_weighting == ...
807 
808  if(must) v.normalize(norm);
809 }

817 void Vocabulary::transform

824 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
825 
826 
827 void Vocabulary::transform(const cv::Mat &feature,
828  WordId &word_id, WordValue &weight, NodeId *nid, int levelsup) const
829 {
830  // propagate the feature down the tree
831 
832 
833  // level at which the node must be stored in nid, if given
834  const int nid_level = m_L - levelsup;
835  if(nid_level <= 0 && nid != NULL) *nid = 0; // root
836 
837  NodeId final_id = 0; // root
838  int current_level = 0;
839 
840  do
841  {
842  ++current_level;
843  auto const &nodes = m_nodes[final_id].children;
844  double best_d = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
845 // DescManip::distance(feature, m_nodes[final_id].descriptor);
846 
847  for(const auto &id:nodes)
848  {
849  double d = DescManip::distance(feature, m_nodes[id].descriptor);
850  if(d < best_d)
851  {
852  best_d = d;
853  final_id = id;
854  }
855  }
856 
857  if(nid != NULL && current_level == nid_level)
858  *nid = final_id;
859 
860  } while( !m_nodes[final_id].isLeaf() );
861 
862  // turn node id into word id
863  word_id = m_nodes[final_id].word_id;
864  weight = m_nodes[final_id].weight;
865 }
866 
867 
868 
869 void Vocabulary::transform(const cv::Mat &feature,
870  WordId &word_id, WordValue &weight ) const
871 {
872  // propagate the feature down the tree
873 
874 
875  // level at which the node must be stored in nid, if given
876 
877  NodeId final_id = 0; // root
878 //maximum speed by computing here distance and avoid calling to DescManip::distance
879 
880  //binary descriptor
881  // int ntimes=0;
882  if (feature.type()==CV_8U){
883  do
884  {
885  auto const &nodes = m_nodes[final_id].children;
886  uint64_t best_d = std::numeric_limits<uint64_t>::max();
887  int idx=0,bestidx=0;
888  for(const auto &id:nodes)
889  {
890  //compute distance
891  // std::cout<<idx<< " "<<id<<" "<< m_nodes[id].descriptor<<std::endl;
892  uint64_t dist= DescManip::distance_8uc1(feature, m_nodes[id].descriptor);
893  if(dist < best_d)
894  {
895  best_d = dist;
896  final_id = id;
897  bestidx=idx;
898  }
899  idx++;
900  }
901  // std::cout<<bestidx<<" "<<final_id<<" d:"<<best_d<<" "<<m_nodes[final_id].descriptor<< std::endl<<std::endl;
902  } while( !m_nodes[final_id].isLeaf() );
903  }
904 
905 // uint64_t ret=0;
906 // const uchar *pb = b.ptr<uchar>();
907 // for(int i=0;i<a.cols;i++,pa++,pb++){
908 // uchar v=(*pa)^(*pb);
909 //#ifdef __GNUG__
910 // ret+=__builtin_popcount(v);//only in g++
911 //#else
912 
913 // ret+=v& (1<<0);
914 // ret+=v& (1<<1);
915 // ret+=v& (1<<2);
916 // ret+=v& (1<<3);
917 // ret+=v& (1<<4);
918 // ret+=v& (1<<5);
919 // ret+=v& (1<<6);
920 // ret+=v& (1<<7);
921 //#endif
922 // }
923 // return ret;
924 // }
925 // else{
926 // double sqd = 0.;
927 // assert(a.type()==CV_32F);
928 // assert(a.rows==1);
929 // const float *a_ptr=a.ptr<float>(0);
930 // const float *b_ptr=b.ptr<float>(0);
931 // for(int i = 0; i < a.cols; i ++)
932 // sqd += (a_ptr[i ] - b_ptr[i ])*(a_ptr[i ] - b_ptr[i ]);
933 // return sqd;
934 // }
935 
936 
937 // do
938 // {
939 // auto const &nodes = m_nodes[final_id].children;
940 // double best_d = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
941 
942 // for(const auto &id:nodes)
943 // {
944 // double d = DescManip::distance(feature, m_nodes[id].descriptor);
945 // if(d < best_d)
946 // {
947 // best_d = d;
948 // final_id = id;
949 // }
950 // }
951 // } while( !m_nodes[final_id].isLeaf() );
952 
953  // turn node id into word id
954  word_id = m_nodes[final_id].word_id;
955  weight = m_nodes[final_id].weight;
956 }
957 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
958 
959 NodeId Vocabulary::getParentNode
960  (WordId wid, int levelsup) const
961 {
962  NodeId ret = m_words[wid]->id; // node id
963  while(levelsup > 0 && ret != 0) // ret == 0 --> root
964  {
965  --levelsup;
966  ret = m_nodes[ret].parent;
967  }
968  return ret;
969 }
970 
971 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
972 
973 
974 void Vocabulary::getWordsFromNode
975  (NodeId nid, std::vector<WordId> &words) const
976 {
977  words.clear();
978 
979  if(m_nodes[nid].isLeaf())
980  {
981  words.push_back(m_nodes[nid].word_id);
982  }
983  else
984  {
985  words.reserve(m_k); // ^1, ^2, ...
986 
987  std::vector<NodeId> parents;
988  parents.push_back(nid);
989 
990  while(!parents.empty())
991  {
992  NodeId parentid = parents.back();
993  parents.pop_back();
994 
995  const std::vector<NodeId> &child_ids = m_nodes[parentid].children;
996  std::vector<NodeId>::const_iterator cit;
997 
998  for(cit = child_ids.begin(); cit != child_ids.end(); ++cit)
999  {
1000  const Node &child_node = m_nodes[*cit];
1001 
1002  if(child_node.isLeaf())
1003  words.push_back(child_node.word_id);
1004  else
1005  parents.push_back(*cit);
1006 
1007  } // for each child
1008  } // while !parents.empty
1009  }
1010 }
1011 
1012 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
1013 
1014 
1015 int Vocabulary::stopWords(double minWeight)
1016 {
1017  int c = 0;
1018  for(auto wit = m_words.begin(); wit != m_words.end(); ++wit)
1019  {
1020  if((*wit)->weight < minWeight)
1021  {
1022  ++c;
1023  (*wit)->weight = 0;
1024  }
1025  }
1026  return c;
1027 }

1032 void Vocabulary::save(const std::string &filename, bool binary_compressed) const
1033 {
1034 
1035  if ( filename.find(".yml")==std::string::npos){
1036  std::ofstream file_out(filename,std::ios::binary);
1037  if (!file_out) throw std::runtime_error("Vocabulary::saveBinary Could not open file :"+filename+" for writing");
1038  toStream(file_out,binary_compressed);
1039  }
1040  else{
1041  cv::FileStorage fs(filename.c_str(), cv::FileStorage::WRITE);
1042  if(!fs.isOpened()) throw std::string("Could not open file ") + filename;
1043  save(fs);
1044  }
1045 }

1047 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------

1049 
1050 void Vocabulary::load(const std::string &filename)
1051 {
1052  //check first if it is a binary file
1053  std::ifstream ifile(filename,std::ios::binary);
1054  if (!ifile) throw std::runtime_error("Vocabulary::load Could not open file :"+filename+" for reading");
1055  uint64_t sig;//magic number describing the file
1056  ifile.read((char*)&sig,sizeof(sig));
1057  if (sig==88877711233) {//it is a binary file. read from it
1058  ifile.seekg(0,std::ios::beg);
1059  fromStream(ifile);
1060 
1061  }
1062  else{
1063  if ( filename.find(".txt")!=std::string::npos){
1064  //read from a text file (used in ORBSLAM2)
1065  load_fromtxt(filename);
1066  }
1067  else{
1068  cv::FileStorage fs(filename.c_str(), cv::FileStorage::READ);
1069  if(!fs.isOpened()) throw std::string("Could not open file ") + filename;
1070  this->load(fs);
1071  }
1072  }
1073 }
1074 
1075 
1076 void Vocabulary::save(cv::FileStorage &f,
1077  const std::string &name) const
1078 {
1079 
1080  f << name << "{";
1081 
1082  f << "k" << m_k;
1083  f << "L" << m_L;
1084  f << "scoringType" << m_scoring;
1085  f << "weightingType" << m_weighting;
1086 
1087  // tree
1088  f << "nodes" << "[";
1089  std::vector<NodeId> parents, children;
1090  std::vector<NodeId>::const_iterator pit;
1091 
1092  parents.push_back(0); // root
1093 
1094  while(!parents.empty())
1095  {
1096  NodeId pid = parents.back();
1097  parents.pop_back();
1098 
1099  const Node& parent = m_nodes[pid];
1100  children = parent.children;
1101 
1102  for(pit = children.begin(); pit != children.end(); pit++)
1103  {
1104  const Node& child = m_nodes[*pit];
1105  std::cout<<m_nodes[*pit].id<<" ";
1106 
1107  // save node data
1108  f << "{:";
1109  f << "nodeId" << (int)child.id;
1110  f << "parentId" << (int)pid;
1111  f << "weight" << (double)child.weight;
1112  f << "descriptor" << DescManip::toString(child.descriptor);
1113  f << "}";
1114 
1115  // add to parent list
1116  if(!child.isLeaf())
1117  {
1118  parents.push_back(*pit);
1119  }
1120  }
1121  }
1122  std::cout<<"\n";
1123 
1124  f << "]"; // nodes
1125 
1126  // words
1127  f << "words" << "[";
1128 
1129  for(auto wit = m_words.begin(); wit != m_words.end(); wit++)
1130  {
1131  WordId id = wit - m_words.begin();
1132  f << "{:";
1133  f << "wordId" << (int)id;
1134  f << "nodeId" << (int)(*wit)->id;
1135  f << "}";
1136  }
1137 
1138  f << "]"; // words
1139 
1140  f << "}";
1141 
1142 }
1143 
1144 void Vocabulary::toStream( std::ostream &out_str, bool compressed) const throw(std::exception){
1145 
1146  uint64_t sig=88877711233;//magic number describing the file
1147  out_str.write((char*)&sig,sizeof(sig));
1148  out_str.write((char*)&compressed,sizeof(compressed));
1149  uint32_t nnodes=m_nodes.size();
1150  out_str.write((char*)&nnodes,sizeof(nnodes));
1151  if (nnodes==0)return;
1152  //save everything to a stream
1153  std::stringstream aux_stream;
1154  aux_stream.write((char*)&m_k,sizeof(m_k));
1155  aux_stream.write((char*)&m_L,sizeof(m_L));
1156  aux_stream.write((char*)&m_scoring,sizeof(m_scoring));
1157  aux_stream.write((char*)&m_weighting,sizeof(m_weighting));
1158  //nodes
1159  std::vector<NodeId> parents={0};// root
1160 
1161 
1162  while(!parents.empty())
1163  {
1164  NodeId pid = parents.back();
1165  parents.pop_back();
1166 
1167  const Node& parent = m_nodes[pid];
1168 
1169  for(auto pit :parent.children)
1170  {
1171 
1172  const Node& child = m_nodes[pit];
1173  aux_stream.write((char*)&child.id,sizeof(child.id));
1174  aux_stream.write((char*)&pid,sizeof(pid));
1175  aux_stream.write((char*)&child.weight,sizeof(child.weight));
1176  DescManip::toStream(child.descriptor,aux_stream);
1177  // add to parent list
1178  if(!child.isLeaf()) parents.push_back(pit);
1179  }
1180  }
1181  //words
1182  //save size
1183  uint32_t m_words_size=m_words.size();
1184  aux_stream.write((char*)&m_words_size,sizeof(m_words_size));
1185  for(auto wit = m_words.begin(); wit != m_words.end(); wit++)
1186  {
1187  WordId id = wit - m_words.begin();
1188  aux_stream.write((char*)&id,sizeof(id));
1189  aux_stream.write((char*)&(*wit)->id,sizeof((*wit)->id));
1190  }
1191 
1192 
1193  //now, decide if compress or not
1194  if (compressed){
1195  qlz_state_compress state_compress;
1196  memset(&state_compress, 0, sizeof(qlz_state_compress));
1197  //Create output buffer
1198  int chunkSize=10000;
1199  std::vector<char> compressed( chunkSize+size_t(400), 0);
1200  std::vector<char> input( chunkSize, 0);
1201  int64_t total_size= static_cast<int64_t>(aux_stream.tellp());
1202  uint64_t total_compress_size=0;
1203  //calculate how many chunks will be written
1204  uint32_t nChunks= total_size / chunkSize;
1205  if ( total_size%chunkSize!=0) nChunks++;
1206  out_str.write((char*)&nChunks, sizeof(nChunks));
1207  //start compressing the chunks
1208  while (total_size != 0){
1209  int readSize=chunkSize;
1210  if (total_size<chunkSize) readSize=total_size;
1211  aux_stream.read(&input[0],readSize);
1212  uint64_t compressed_size = qlz_compress(&input[0], &compressed[0], readSize, &state_compress);
1213  total_size-=readSize;
1214  out_str.write(&compressed[0], compressed_size);
1215  total_compress_size+=compressed_size;
1216  }
1217  }
1218  else{
1219  out_str<<aux_stream.rdbuf();
1220  }
1221 }
1222 
1223 
1224 void Vocabulary:: load_fromtxt(const std::string &filename)throw(std::runtime_error){
1225 
1226  std::ifstream ifile(filename);
1227  if(!ifile)throw std::runtime_error("Vocabulary:: load_fromtxt Could not open file for reading:"+filename);
1228  int n1, n2;
1229  {
1230  std::string str;
1231  getline(ifile,str);
1232  std::stringstream ss(str);
1233  ss>>m_k>>m_L>>n1>>n2;
1234  }
1235  if(m_k<0 || m_k>20 || m_L<1 || m_L>10 || n1<0 || n1>5 || n2<0 || n2>3)
1236  throw std::runtime_error( "Vocabulary loading failure: This is not a correct text file!" );
1237 
1238  m_scoring = (ScoringType)n1;
1239  m_weighting = (WeightingType)n2;
1240  createScoringObject();
1241  // nodes
1242  int expected_nodes =
1243  (int)((pow((double)m_k, (double)m_L + 1) - 1)/(m_k - 1));
1244  m_nodes.reserve(expected_nodes);
1245 
1246  m_words.reserve(pow((double)m_k, (double)m_L + 1));
1247 
1248  m_nodes.resize(1);
1249  m_nodes[0].id = 0;
1250 
1251  int counter=0;
1252  while(!ifile.eof()){
1253  std::string snode;
1254  getline(ifile,snode);
1255  if (counter++%100==0)std::cerr<<".";
1256  // std::cout<<snode<<std::endl;
1257  if (snode.size()==0)break;
1258  std::stringstream ssnode(snode);
1259 
1260  int nid = m_nodes.size();
1261  m_nodes.resize(m_nodes.size()+1);
1262  m_nodes[nid].id = nid;
1263 
1264  int pid ;
1265  ssnode >> pid;
1266  m_nodes[nid].parent = pid;
1267  m_nodes[pid].children.push_back(nid);
1268 
1269  int nIsLeaf;
1270  ssnode >> nIsLeaf;
1271 
1272  //read until the end and add to data
1273  std::vector<float> data;data.reserve(100);
1274  float d;
1275  while( ssnode>>d) data.push_back(d);
1276  //the weight is the last
1277  m_nodes[nid].weight=data.back();
1278  data.pop_back();//remove
1279  //the rest, to the descriptor
1280  m_nodes[nid].descriptor.create(1,data.size(),CV_8UC1);
1281  auto ptr=m_nodes[nid].descriptor.ptr<uchar>(0);
1282  for(auto d:data) *ptr++=d;
1283 
1284 
1285  if(nIsLeaf>0)
1286  {
1287  int wid = m_words.size();
1288  m_words.resize(wid+1);
1289 
1290  m_nodes[nid].word_id = wid;
1291  m_words[wid] = &m_nodes[nid];
1292  }
1293  else
1294  {
1295  m_nodes[nid].children.reserve(m_k);
1296  }
1297  }
1298 }
1299 void Vocabulary::fromStream( std::istream &str ) throw(std::exception){
1300 
1301 
1302  m_words.clear();
1303  m_nodes.clear();
1304  uint64_t sig=0;//magic number describing the file
1305  str.read((char*)&sig,sizeof(sig));
1306  if (sig!=88877711233) throw std::runtime_error("Vocabulary::fromStream is not of appropriate type");
1307  bool compressed;
1308  str.read((char*)&compressed,sizeof(compressed));
1309  uint32_t nnodes;
1310  str.read((char*)&nnodes,sizeof(nnodes));
1311  if(nnodes==0)return;
1312  std::stringstream decompressed_stream;
1313  std::istream *_used_str=0;
1314  if (compressed){
1315  qlz_state_decompress state_decompress;
1316  memset(&state_decompress, 0, sizeof(qlz_state_decompress));
1317  int chunkSize=10000;
1318  std::vector<char> decompressed(chunkSize);
1319  std::vector<char> input(chunkSize+400);
1320  //read how many chunks are there
1321  uint32_t nChunks;
1322  str.read((char*)&nChunks,sizeof(nChunks));
1323  for(int i=0;i<nChunks;i++){
1324  str.read(&input[0],9);
1325  int c=qlz_size_compressed(&input[0]);
1326  str.read(&input[9],c-9);
1327  size_t d=qlz_decompress(&input[0], &decompressed[0], &state_decompress);
1328  decompressed_stream.write(&decompressed[0],d);
1329  }
1330  _used_str=&decompressed_stream;
1331  }
1332  else{
1333  _used_str=&str;
1334  }
1335 
1336  _used_str->read((char*)&m_k,sizeof(m_k));
1337  _used_str->read((char*)&m_L,sizeof(m_L));
1338  _used_str->read((char*)&m_scoring,sizeof(m_scoring));
1339  _used_str->read((char*)&m_weighting,sizeof(m_weighting));
1340 
1341  createScoringObject();
1342  m_nodes.resize(nnodes );
1343  m_nodes[0].id = 0;
1344 
1345 
1346 
1347  for(size_t i = 1; i < m_nodes.size(); ++i)
1348  {
1349  NodeId nid;
1350  _used_str->read((char*)&nid,sizeof(NodeId));
1351  Node& child = m_nodes[nid];
1352  child.id=nid;
1353  _used_str->read((char*)&child.parent,sizeof(child.parent));
1354  _used_str->read((char*)&child.weight,sizeof(child.weight));
1355  DescManip::fromStream(child.descriptor,*_used_str);
1356  m_nodes[child.parent].children.push_back(child.id);
1357  }
1358  // // words
1359  uint32_t m_words_size;
1360  _used_str->read((char*)&m_words_size,sizeof(m_words_size));
1361  m_words.resize(m_words_size);
1362  for(unsigned int i = 0; i < m_words.size(); ++i)
1363  {
1364  WordId wid;NodeId nid;
1365  _used_str->read((char*)&wid,sizeof(wid));
1366  _used_str->read((char*)&nid,sizeof(nid));
1367  m_nodes[nid].word_id = wid;
1368  m_words[wid] = &m_nodes[nid];
1369  }
1370 }
1371 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
1372 
1373 
1374 
1375 void Vocabulary::load(const cv::FileStorage &fs,
1376  const std::string &name)
1377 {
1378  m_words.clear();
1379  m_nodes.clear();
1380 
1381  cv::FileNode fvoc = fs[name];
1382 
1383  m_k = (int)fvoc["k"];
1384  m_L = (int)fvoc["L"];
1385  m_scoring = (ScoringType)((int)fvoc["scoringType"]);
1386  m_weighting = (WeightingType)((int)fvoc["weightingType"]);
1387 
1388  createScoringObject();
1389 
1390  // nodes
1391  cv::FileNode fn = fvoc["nodes"];
1392 
1393  m_nodes.resize(fn.size() + 1); // +1 to include root
1394  m_nodes[0].id = 0;
1395 
1396  for(unsigned int i = 0; i < fn.size(); ++i)
1397  {
1398  NodeId nid = (int)fn[i]["nodeId"];
1399  NodeId pid = (int)fn[i]["parentId"];
1400  WordValue weight = (WordValue)fn[i]["weight"];
1401  std::string d = (std::string)fn[i]["descriptor"];
1402 
1403  m_nodes[nid].id = nid;
1404  m_nodes[nid].parent = pid;
1405  m_nodes[nid].weight = weight;
1406  m_nodes[pid].children.push_back(nid);
1407 
1408  DescManip::fromString(m_nodes[nid].descriptor, d);
1409  }
1410 
1411  // words
1412  fn = fvoc["words"];
1413 
1414  m_words.resize(fn.size());
1415 
1416  for(unsigned int i = 0; i < fn.size(); ++i)
1417  {
1418  NodeId wid = (int)fn[i]["wordId"];
1419  NodeId nid = (int)fn[i]["nodeId"];
1420 
1421  m_nodes[nid].word_id = wid;
1422  m_words[wid] = &m_nodes[nid];
1423  }
1424 }
1425 
1426 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
1427 
1434 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream &os,
1435  const Vocabulary &voc)
1436 {
1437  os << "Vocabulary: k = " << voc.getBranchingFactor()
1438  << ", L = " << voc.getDepthLevels()
1439  << ", Weighting = ";
1440 
1441  switch(voc.getWeightingType())
1442  {
1443  case TF_IDF: os << "tf-idf"; break;
1444  case TF: os << "tf"; break;
1445  case IDF: os << "idf"; break;
1446  case BINARY: os << "binary"; break;
1447  }
1448 
1449  os << ", Scoring = ";
1450  switch(voc.getScoringType())
1451  {
1452  case L1_NORM: os << "L1-norm"; break;
1453  case L2_NORM: os << "L2-norm"; break;
1454  case CHI_SQUARE: os << "Chi square distance"; break;
1455  case KL: os << "KL-divergence"; break;
1456  case BHATTACHARYYA: os << "Bhattacharyya coefficient"; break;
1457  case DOT_PRODUCT: os << "Dot product"; break;
1458  }
1459 
1460  os << ", Number of words = " << voc.size();
1461 
1462  return os;
1463 }
1467 void Vocabulary::clear(){
1468  delete m_scoring_object;
1469  m_scoring_object=0;
1470  m_nodes.clear();
1471  m_words.clear();
1472 
1473 }
1474 int Vocabulary::getDescritorSize()const
1475 {
1476  if (m_words.size()==0)return -1;
1477  else return m_words[0]->descriptor.cols;
1478 }
1479 int Vocabulary::getDescritorType()const{
1480 
1481  if (m_words.size()==0)return -1;
1482  else return m_words[0]->descriptor.type();
1483 }
